## FrameStats.addValue() method

Add a value to the current value of the performance number. If the performance is not known, it will be initialized with `value`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addValue(name: string, value: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of the performance number. |
|  value | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
